Player History
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/4/1967 to a 3-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/1967 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Boston in 1968...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1969...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/3/1970 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 4/14/1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1970, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1970, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Injured on 5/6/1970 with a Broken Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Detroit on 6/21/1970...
Injured on 8/14/1970 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1970, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1971, hitting .434 with 4 HR, 18 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/5/1971...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1971...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
